product_name: Light My Fire FireSteel Scout 2.0 Fire Starter
long_description: The Light My Fire FireSteel(R) Scout 2.0 fire starter tool improves upon the original FireSteel Scout with a new striker and an integrated emergency whistle. Improved stainless-steel striker features an ergonomic grip for easy striking; striker provides 3,000 to 12,000 strikes. Pulling the stainless-steel striker down the rod emits 5,500degF sparks that can ignite a stove, paper, dry grass or bark. Rod also features an ergonomic grip to improve performance. Tool works just as well when wet for use in any weather and at any altitude. Built-in emergency whistle lets you signal for help. Light My Fire FireSteel Scout 2.0 fire starter includes striker, rod, lanyard and integrated emergency whistle. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: The Light My Fire FireSteel(R) Scout 2.0 fire starter tool improves upon the original FireSteel Scout with a new striker and an integrated emergency whistle.
